verses.text: 神秉公審判 （大衛因便雅憫人古實的話，向耶和華所唱的“士迦庸」。）耶和華我的 神啊！我已經投靠了你，求你拯救我脫離所有追趕我的人。求你搭救我，

words.note: Capitalized character indicates reverence for God.
便雅憫 (Benjamin) + 人 (people).
The Hebrew name of God, often translated 'LORD'.
Forms a relative clause or emphasizes the object.
A musical or liturgical term, possibly 'a wandering song'.
The Hebrew name of God, often translated 'LORD'.
Capitalized character indicates reverence for God.

verses.text: 免得他們像獅子一般把我撕裂，把我撕碎的時候，也沒有人搭救。
耶和華我的 神啊！如果我作了這事，如果我手中有罪孽，

words.note: The Hebrew name of God, often translated 'LORD'.
Capitalized character indicates reverence for God.

verses.text: 如果我以惡回報那與我為友的人，或是無故掠奪與我為敵的人，
就任憑仇敵追趕我，直到追上，把我的性命踐踏在地上，使我的光榮歸於塵土。（細拉）

words.note: A Hebrew word of uncertain meaning, possibly a musical or liturgical direction.

verses.text: 耶和華啊！求你在怒中起來，求你挺身而起，抵擋我敵人的暴怒，求你為我興起；你已經出令施行審判。
願萬民聚集環繞你，願你歸回高處，統管他們。
願耶和華審判萬民。耶和華啊！求你按著我的公義，照著我心中的正直判斷我。
願惡人的惡行止息，願你使義人堅立。公義的 神啊！你是察驗人心腸肺腑的。

words.note: Capitalized when referring to the one true God.
Lit. 'lungs and viscera'; refers to one's deepest thoughts and emotions.

verses.text: 神是我的盾牌，他拯救心裡正直的人。

words.note: Capitalized when referring to the one true God.

verses.text: 神是公義的審判者，他是天天向惡人發怒的 神。

words.note: Refers to divine justice and righteousness.
A full-width space often used before 'God' (神) in Chinese Bibles to show reverence.

verses.text: 如果人不悔改， 神必把他的刀磨快。 神已經把弓拉開，準備妥當。

words.note: A full-width space often used before 'God' (神) in Chinese Bibles to show reverence.
Marks a verb-object construction where the object is moved before the verb for emphasis.
A full-width space often used before 'God' (神) in Chinese Bibles to show reverence.
Marks a verb-object construction where the object is moved before the verb for emphasis.

verses.text: 他親自預備了致命的武器，他使所射的箭成為燃燒的箭。

words.note: Indicates the following verb forms a noun phrase or relative clause.

verses.text: 看哪！惡人為了罪孽經歷產痛，他懷的是惡毒，生下的是虛謊。

words.note: Forms a nominalized structure 'what is [verb/adjective]'.
Forms a nominalized structure 'what is [verb/adjective]'.

verses.text: 他挖掘坑穴，挖得深深的，自己卻掉進所挖的陷阱裡。

words.note: Connects a verb/adjective to a descriptive complement.
Reduplication of 'deep' for emphasis, followed by adverbial particle 'de'.
Indicates the following verb forms a noun phrase or relative clause.

verses.text: 他的惡毒必回到自己的頭上，他的強暴必落在自己的頭頂上。

words.note: Lit. 'evil poison'
Indicates arrival or result of action
Lit. 'strong violence'

words.definition: on the crown of one's head

verses.text: 我要照著耶和華的公義稱謝他，歌頌至高者耶和華的名。

words.note: Biblical concept of God's justice
Commonly used for giving thanks to God
Lit. 'sing eulogy'
A title for God
